Module com.um_project_golf
Package com.um_project_golf.Core.Entity

Class SceneManager

java.lang.Object
com.um_project_golf.Core.Entity.SceneManager
public class SceneManager extends Object
The scene manager class. This class is responsible for the scene manager of the game.

      public SceneManager(float lightAngle)
